talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Remote Quest$</html>

$King Cassius$
Come in. Y-you saw the city on your way here, right?

$King Cassius$
I'm relieved to hear that. Uh, make sure you find out what happened.

$Terrence Terramai$
……

$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
……

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You have a lot to say, but hold your tongue.)</FONT> The view of Saint Haven looks a little different.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Welcome, {user_nick}. You didn't bring me more troubles, did you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That's why the king said what he said.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Are you... are you talking about what His Majesty said? Nothing has changed. It's a city. It can look different depending on your mood.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(If anyone might know, it would be Kallaen.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
I'm worried that Cassius is not sleeping well these days. Don't say anything weird to him.

$Terrence Terramai${action:Talk}
I'm worried that you might be seeing things because you're overworked. I also worry about His Majesty pushing himself too hard at such a young age. You shouldn't do that. Health is foremost.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hasn't Saint Haven changed a bit?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Guard Joey${action:Talk}
How many times must I tell you? It's really difficult to talk to you while I'm on duty. But... is something the matter?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Maybe the streets, buildings, or where you stand on duty…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Guard Joey$
Has something changed? I don't know what you're talking about. I've always been on duty here, but nothing has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(He doesn't seem to know anything. Let's go to another area.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Guard Joey$
Hmm, not at all. Actually, the view from the gate on this street is particularly good. I don't know what the problem is, but wouldn't it better if you took a load off and admired the beauty of Saint Haven?

$Royal Guard Joey$
Hmm, not at all. Actually, the view from the gate on this street is particularly good. I don't know what the problem is, but wouldn't it better if you took a load off and admired the beauty of Saint Haven?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You ask if there have been any changes lately in Saint Haven)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella${action:Talk}
Welcome, {user_nick}. No wonder the Spitflowers have been especially lively today. I guess it's because you were approaching.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Not that... I mean, has the suddenly the city suddenly gotten bigger, or have the buildings changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
What's changed? Um... Well, it's such a well-developed place that there haven't been significant changes in real estate prices.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah… I see...<FONT color=#7e12d2> (What did I expect from her?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
Is there any crazy theory you won't entertain? Hey, don't go around talking like that. Have you ever thought about how much the price of land here would fluctuate if such huge changes occurred? How would I not notice something like that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You'll have to find someone who knows more about this situation.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
The prices of houses and shops are not budging. I even started looking for availabilities in Lotus Marsh. You'd better give up if you want to invest here.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
The prices of houses and shops are not budging. I even started looking for availabilities in Lotus Marsh. You'd better give up if you want to invest here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Exactly! What the heck happened to the city?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri${action:Talk}
Hello, {user_nick}! Eh? What's wrong? You look as if the city you've been living in has disappeared before your eyes!

$Traveller Pri$
It has to do with dreams, doesn't it? Yes, I'm sure of it. It must be an issue involving dreams. Ugh...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Have you noticed any changes in Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea${action:Talk}
Welcome. Why do you look so confused?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I, I see. (Even the priestess...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Huh? My role is to monitor the Goddess's nightmare, not Saint Haven. Hmm... Nothing seems to have changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Vibrations in the Nightmare? No way... That could be shaking up our world...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
However, the flow of the nightmare has clearly changed, if subtly. I felt a vibration earlier, as if a huge stone had been thrown in.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
I'm not sure about that, but we're investigating because we need to find out the cause of the vibration. I'll let you know as soon as we learn something.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Silver Dragon's Forcefield? Wait… The path it…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Even the path has changed.)</FONT>All right. I'll get going.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$ Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Have you forgotten? Here, I'll mark it for you.
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Complete$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm fine, but did everything go well in Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
Oh? {user_nick}? What brings you here? Is everything okay?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, it's nothing... I'm just worried.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
Did something happen? You don't mean that I've become more dazzling, do you? I do enjoy looking at myself in the mirror. But if it's not that, is there something ominous afoot?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It seems Kallaen is also unaware of what is going on. Go ask Terramai about the situation.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Palace Sorceress Kallaen${action:Talk}
Oh, are you worried about me? That's so sweet of you. I'm touched you've been worried. Anyway, if there's something wrong with Saint Haven, there's no way I wouldn't recognize it. Fear not.

$Duke Stuart$
I'm worried that Cassius is not sleeping well these days. Don't say anything weird to him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. By the way, has anything happened in Saint Haven?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai${action:Talk}
Thanks for your hard work. Are you well?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Actually, I think the city has changed, too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
Interesting, His Majesty just asked me the same thing. But I didn't feel any change.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Uh... You really don't know? Maybe there was a big construction project or...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
Is that so? Can you tell me what has changed?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
A few years ago, we had a major renovation in the city, but... Are you sure you're not overdoing yourself these days?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Nobody here ever leaves the palace, so let's ask people outside.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
I'm worried that you might be seeing things because you're overworked. I also worry about His Majesty pushing himself too hard at such a young age. You shouldn't do that. Health is foremost.

$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
Oh, are you worried about me? That's so sweet of you. I'm touched you've been worried. Anyway, if there's something wrong with Saint Haven, there's no way I wouldn't recognize it. Fear not.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look at the Goddess Statue!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri${action:Talk}
Eh? What do you mean? I've been here the whole time, and nothing has happened!
The sky is clear and the wind is cool and I feel good!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
Do you not have eyes? Are you blind? It's completely different from the original statue.
Here, this fountain! This flower bed! Not only those, the entire city has changed!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Congratulations on gaining your sight back. What the heck has happened here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
(Only then does Pri look up at the statue.)
Aaaaah!!!?! Aaaah!!!! What is this?! Oh Goddess! The statue has changed!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Even Pri didn't recognize it?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
Let me see, let me check the coordinates of Time and Space... Huh?! The location is... It's a different location. Why didn't I know this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Having heard from Pri, it seems you should go to someone who is an expert on the Goddess's dreams.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
Ugh, perhaps I'm so influenced by the dream that I almost didn't notice! Ahhh... I shouldn't talk about such matters! Well, it might be okay to talk about this with you, {user_nick}... But why... It has something to do with the Goddess's dream, doesn't it? That's what this is, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, a lot of things have changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
Come in. Y-you saw the city on your way here, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wh, what?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
(Cassius opens his eyes wide with surprise.)
Yes! It has changed! That's what I've been saying!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No one else sees it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
The city has changed! But... I-I know, but nobody else recognizes it.
I was... wondering if I was wrong...
(Cassius's voice weakens.)
But the city... has changed...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Well, since he's the king, he can't just go out and ask for himself.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
No. Everyone says they don't know what I mean. I don't know what to do about this... I don't know. Could you…
{user_nick}, could you find out what's going on?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I will do my best.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
So, consider this an order. I need you to find out what is going on... Whether it really is only you and me who know... and why this has happened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You take your leave from Cassius.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
I'm relieved to hear that. Uh, make sure you find out what happened.

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go speak with Captain Richard by yourself.
King Cassius has contacted you. He seems to be filled with fearful doubts about what is happening to the city. You should go to the palace. But first, meet Richard, the Captain of the Guards.

Saint Haven - Captain Richard
journal.todo_msg: Go speak with Captain Richard alone.

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Go speak with King Cassius.
King Cassius has contacted you. He seems to be filled with fearful doubts about what is happening to the city. You should go to the palace and speak with Cassius.

Saint Haven - King Cassius

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Duke Stuart.
You arrived in Saint Haven after receiving a request from King Cassius. You and Cassius are the only ones who vaguely remember the Old Saint Haven. Why is that? Make sure everyone else really doesn't recognize the situation.

Saint Haven-Duke Stuart

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Palace Sorceress Kallaen.
You arrived in Saint Haven after receiving a request from King Cassius. You and Cassius are the only ones who vaguely remember the Old Saint Haven. Why is that? Make sure everyone else really doesn't recognize the situation.

Saint Haven-Palace Sorceress Kallaen

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Terrence Terramai.
You arrived in Saint Haven after receiving a request from King Cassius. You and Cassius are the only ones who vaguely remember the Old Saint Haven. Why is that? Make sure everyone else really doesn't recognize the situation.

Saint Haven-Terrence Terramai

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Royal Guard Joey.
It seems that no one in the royal palace recognizes the changes. Head outside and speak with the city people in person. Royal Guard Joey, who always stands guard near the palace, may know something.

Saint Haven-Royal Guard Joey

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅶ
journal.contents:
Speak with Master Sorceress Stella.
Joey says nothing has changed. It might be because he's standing too close to the palace. Maybe people in other parts of the city know something.

Saint Haven-Master Sorceress Stella

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅷ
journal.contents:
Speak with Traveller Pri alone.
No one recognizes the enormous changes. But someone who can travel through time and space may see what is going on. Traveller Pri... Might he know something?

Saint Haven-Traveller Pri

journal.title: Unrecognized Changes Ⅸ
journal.contents:
Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea.
Traveller Pri seems to be panicking. According to the panicky Pri, there seems to be an unexpected change in the Goddess's dream. If that's the case, you should speak with the Priestess of Darkness.

Saint Haven-Priestess of Darkness Shea
journal.destination: Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea.
